name: PC Monitors
tag_list: computer-monitors, monitors, pc-monitors, displays, screens, computer-hardware, peripherals
overview: Provides product reviews and expert advice related to computer monitors. The latest PC monitors are also available to buy online with personal recommendations freely provided. We specialise in Samsung, BenQ, Dell and NEC monitors but have considerable experience with other PC monitor manufacturers. We also provide information related to future computer monitor releases from all manufacturers and are always open to questions and suggestions by email, website comments and via our new online forums.
